name: PEAK
description:
PEAK

PEAK is an arcade gliding game in a rough, low-tech world, where gigantic beasts are corrupted by an ancient crystal. You will have to hunt them while going down jade mountains on your windsurf.
It is our student project at the CNAM - ENJMIN. During the last 3 months of our final year, we had to create a vertical slice of the game during a pre-production. Peak will be single-player only, but we are working to make an experience pleasant to watch by others.
As a team of eleven students, we gathered around a concept focused on the following aspects :

  • Glide
  • Boss fight
  • Thrill
  • Easy to play
  • Juicy
